description:
The Hyper-V agent is currently enabling metrics collection per vm, instead of per disk.
This leads to erroneous values collected for disk metrics.
title: Hyper-V agent does not enable disk metrics for individual disks

comments.content:
The Hyper-V agent is currently enabling metrics collection per vm, instead of per disk.
This leads to erroneous values collected for disk metrics.
comments.author: https://api.launchpad.net/1.0/~cbelu

comments.content:
Fix proposed to branch: master
Review: https://review.openstack.org/80420
comments.author: https://api.launchpad.net/1.0/~hudson-openstack

comments.content:
Reviewed:  https://review.openstack.org/80420
Committed: https://git.openstack.org/cgit/openstack/nova/commit/?id=a41ef0ede2cdace1db4d932e0931509a84ba837e
Submitter: Jenkins
Branch:    master

commit a41ef0ede2cdace1db4d932e0931509a84ba837e
Author: Claudiu Belu <email address hidden>
Date:   Wed Nov 20 14:27:51 2013 -0800

    Fixes the Hyper-V agent individual disk metrics
    
    Replaces aggregated metric values with separated values for each disk.
    
    Change-Id: I3c264dfd52572e5c429ee606a47a5727a4a3af3c
    Closes-Bug: #1290403
